examples.title: blank-project
examples.description: A blank project to start from scratch.

examples.title: citycoin
examples.description: A real-world use case demonstrates the proof of transfer of New York City Coins from one account to another.

examples.title: clarity-bitcoin
examples.description: Clarity functions that help with reading and verifying transactions on the Bitcoin blockchain.

examples.title: counter
examples.description: An on-chain counter function in Clarity that stores and increments a count on every transaction.

examples.title: fungible-token
examples.description: An implementation of SIP010-compliant fungible token in Clarity.

examples.title: hello-world
examples.description: A beginner smart contract with examples of commonly used Clarity expressions and data structures.

examples.title: lightning-swaps
examples.description: A submarine swap implementation to provide a fast, private way of swapping Lightning Network Bitcoin for Stacks and vice versa.

examples.title: nft-marketplace
examples.description: A simple NFT marketplace implementation to list NFTs for sales.

examples.title: non-fungible-token-real
examples.description: An implementation of SIP009-compliant non-fungible tokens in Clarity.

examples.title: clarity-examples-ordyswap
examples.description: A contract implementing a trustless peer-to-peer atomic swap between Bitcoin Ordinals and STX.
